vague_description: Determine the optimal allocation of transportation to meet the minimum requirements while meeting all constraints.
detailed_description: A party organizer needs to transport party goers either by limousine or bus. Limousines can carry \param{LimousineCapacity} people and buses can carry \param{BusCapacity} people. They need to transport at least \param{MinimumPeople} people. Because limousines are more attractive, at least \param{MinimumLimousinePercentage} of the vehicles must be limousines. How many of each type of vehicle should be used to minimize the total number of limousines and buses used?
target_objective: Minimize the total number of vehicles used
target_constraints: Number of limousines used is non-negative
Number of buses used is non-negative
At least MinimumPeople must be transported
At least MinimumLimousinePercentage of the vehicles must be limousines
target_parameters: Minimum number of people to transport
Minimum percentage of vehicles that must be limousines
